title: Context-Based Job English Learning Design Using Mobile Technology: Integrating Social Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English communication skills and basic understanding of business culture/etiquette
context.additional_context: Learners engage in content creation and collaborative activities using personal mobile devices, emphasizing language use applicable to real-world job situations. Effective communication in global business environments and building social relationships for multicultural understanding are especially highlighted.

learning_goals: Learners will utilize a mobile app to produce intermediate-level English expressions required in daily job contexts (e.g., business meetings, customer consultations) with 80% accuracy, selecting culturally appropriate expressions.

Learners will independently design and share context-specific language learning content (e.g., business emails, presentations, negotiation scenarios) tailored to social relationships (peers, supervisors, clients).
Learners will provide specific feedback on peers' language use through mobile-based peer reviews, considering cultural appropriateness and task efficiency, with at least three instances of feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
